page.title: 09Employment in Knypersley.
page.content: The population of the area is mainly employed outside the are itself.Local employment is small scale and is mainly connected with service industries either for the general public or other larger industries.Employment is mostly for the unskilled or partially qualified worker,frequently at low wages.Local employers include: Tipton Steel;local employees are mainly clerical or delivery staff. Knypersley Sports Club;chiefly bar staff and cleaners. C.F.Lancaster and Charles Baily; motorspares company,employ sales staff and some skilled car bodyworkers. Staffordshire County Council;employ caretaking staff for the schools. I.V.C.Medical Supplies;a one company employs machinists(textile). Unemployment is high,especially among the young who are unwilling to travel.
